mapper.select: select rid, bid, content, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt from adopt_reply order by reg_dt desc
mapper.insert: insert into adopt_reply(rid, bid, content, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt) values(#{rid}, #{bid}, #{content}, #{reg_id}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update adopt_reply set content=#{content}, edit_dt=now() where rid = #{rid}
